tns:patch.description: Insert new global setting for activating/deactivating decimals in Location percentage

condition.columnvalue: Allow decimal percentage for button Divide Percentages in Location

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings (id, settingsName, settingsValue, possibleValues, description, section) VALUES ((Select (max(id) + 1) from amp_global_settings), 'Decimals in Location percentage', '0', 't_Integer', 'Use 0 to deactivate decimals in Location percentage.', 'general');
